title: GFI Archiver Telerik Web UI Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of GFI Archiver. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the product installer. The issue results from the use of a vulnerable version of Telerik Web UI. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of NETWORK SERVICE.
timeline:
2024-06-06 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2024-12-11 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2024-12-11 - Advisory Updated
